resources.string: Please select a Category and a Type to Hang Up
Tap the camera or photo icon to add photos and start building your closet
Unexpected error while downloading an image.
New! You\'re in control - choose what info you want to share with apps.
We have chosen 12 pics from your photo library.\nKindly tap on any of them to start hanging up.
Click Hang Up to add your wardrobe.
Add at least 2 of each for myDiModa to style you.
Avoid shadows, take good pictures, folded or hanging, it does not matter.
After selecting Style Me, pick your occasion. No items added yet? No worries, demo clothes available.
Have myDiModa style you or pick a starting item and myDiModa will do the rest.
You don\'t seem to have %1$s installed on this device
Rate the app and we\'ll upgrade you to pro version that includes unlimited styling licence for free.
